findings.title: Possible Arithmetic Underflow in unlockByQuantity()
findings.description: The `unlockByQuantity()` function has a possibility of arithmetic underflow issue due to the inner `for`-loop may undesirably introduce an arithmetic underflow if the `idx` variable is equal to `0` when executing `idx -= 1`.

findings.title: Possible Locked Transfer to Frozen Accounts in transferWithLock()
findings.description: The `HTC` token contract allows the privileged pauser to freeze a specific account or lock tokens, but it does not validate whether the recipient is a frozen account when transferring tokens with `transferWithLock()`.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `HTC` token contract, there is a privileged admin account `owner` that plays a critical role in regulating the token-wide operations.
